column4: This is probably an incredibly stupid question, but how do I run a .run file in Intrepid?
open a terminal and just type it's name.. for example "/media/blah.run" -- or if there are no execute permissions on the file, you can usually do "sh /media/blah.run"
try doing a "chmod +x /media/blah.run" first, and then run it just by calling it by name
